summary: The impecunious duo of wandering musicians is struggling to eke out an existence, and Pavlaras' health is deteriorating. Now, they need Keti and Dimitris; but, it's been nearly three years since they last saw them. Where are they now?
cast: Mimis Fotopoulos|Vasilis Avlonitis|Jenny Karezi|Alekos Alexandrakis|Haris Kamili|Nikos Fermas|Periklis Hristoforidis|Lavrentis Dianellos|Dimitris Voudouris|Zoi Fytousi|Giorgos Gavriilidis|Niki Linardou|Laoura|Leta Yannakopoulou|Rea Manelli|Stella Margaritidou|Mary Lafi|Marianna Hatzopoulou|Trio Melody|Giannis Fermis|Takis Hristoforidis|Thodoros Kefalopoulos|Mary Laidou|Athinodoros Prousalis|Giannis Vogiatzis
title: Laterna, ftoheia kai garyfallo
